title: Polk Audio Soundbar Signa S1 AM9214-A
description:
In this video we take a closer look at the Polk Audio Signa S1 soundbar.  For more details or to place an order please call one of our experts at 800-860-3736 or visit us at www.Abt.com.

SIGNAS1: http://www.abt.com/product/112202/Polk-Audio-Black-Sound-Bar-With-Wireless-Subwoofer-AM9214A.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=SIGNAS1_2017125

Features:
- Performance-Tuned Surround Sound: Dolby Digital decoding creates incredible room-filling virtual surround sound that easily beats your TV's small speakers
- Polk VoiceAdjust™ Technology: Customize the voice levels to reproduce clear, crisp dialogue and never miss a single word of your favorite movie, TV show or sporting event
- Low-Profile Design: At 2" tall, it fits most spaces—easily wall-mount it or set it in front of your TV. It won't block your TV's bottom edge or IR remote sensor
- Easy Setup: Included optical cable quickly connects your TV to the sound bar so you're all set up and listening in minutes
- Exclusive Full Complement Deep Bass Technology: Included wireless subwoofer reproduces deep bass impact you can feel
- Wireless Music Streaming: From your smartphone or tablet with Bluetooth®
